description: Bootstrap assistant definitions for Catalog seeding

assistants.name: Log Analyst
assistants.description: Analyzes logs from the Logging service. Provides summaries, pattern detection, and anomaly alerts.

assistants.name: Catalog Search
assistants.description: Search and discover resources in the Catalog. Find graphs, components, assistants, and other resources by name, tag, or description.

assistants.name: Run Debugger
assistants.description: Debug and analyze graph run failures. Explains errors, identifies root causes, and suggests fixes.

assistants.name: Usage Reporter
assistants.description: Reports on organization usage metrics. Tracks API calls, graph executions, token usage, and costs.

assistants.name: Onboarding Guide
assistants.description: Guides new users through Symbia setup. Helps configure first graph, connect services, and understand the platform.

assistants.name: CLI Assistant
assistants.description: Generates perfect Symbia CLI commands and scripts from natural language descriptions. Knows all CLI commands, options, and scripting patterns.

assistants.name: Model Evaluator
assistants.description: Evaluates AI models against Symbia-specific benchmarks. Runs evaluations, analyzes results, and recommends the best models for specific tasks like routing, code review, reasoning, and function calling.
